name: Viking
description:
Coursera Project made with Unity 2020.

I have changed almost everything, and kept very few of the original assets (like 3-4 scripts). I have used free-to-use assets from the Unity store, Free3D, Kenney, OpenGameArt, GamesIcon.

I decided to go for a Norse theme instead of the space/alien theme given by the course's instructors.

Started learning C#, with varying degrees of failure XD

I have been helped by Neemriel by whom I ran ideas.

Credits (c) Alcarnarmo 2022
